introSection.mainDescription: We are the first Latin American platform to connect the most disruptive Blockchain technology projects with regional investors.
introSection.subtitle1: First Latam token distribution channel for regional investors
introSection.subtext1: Cryptocurrencies have emerged as a new asset class and we want to eliminate the technical gap needed to invest in them. We are aware of the current difficulties involved in participating in an ICO. We simplify the token acquisition user experience process and provide relevant information on blockchain projects.
introSection.subtitle2: An advertising platform for Blockchain based business models
introSection.subtext2: We offer an advertising service providing visibility to new decentralized business models and connect them with potential Latam investors.
introSection.subtext3: We are a team of financial analysts, engineers and blockchain developers working to eliminate technical and operational barriers needed to invest in cryptocurrencies in order to benefit society with blockchain technology.

newsletterSection.title: Newsletter subscription
newsletterSection.selectField1: ¿How much do you know about cryptocurrencies?

blogSection.title: Explore our news and tutorials
blogSection.subtitle: Discover new opportunities through simple and clarifying content
